short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for The Coven! Get notification when I'm starting a stream on Twitch.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get notification when i'm starting streaming on Twitch.
The extension icon change color when i'm on stream.
You can have a popup with stream details, my two latest video uploaded on Youtube and my social media.
